title: Start A New Account
body:
As of recently, I've noticed that the level of players I've been queued with in ranked have been sub par at best, and I'm getting paired with players who have their one-trick ponies at an all time good. Mind you, I am in Gold 3, and have done nothing but fall from Plat 5 promo down to this tier. Because of this, I have seriously considered starting a new account, without the $600+ I've thrown into this account for skins and the sort to start fresh with a new MMR that doesn't throw me into garbage tier. 

Thought?
